japanese: なぁに、九郎？/聖純女学院の教室なんか覗いたりして……。/案外、隅に置けないのね。
english: What, Kuro? /Peeking into Seijun classrooms... /You're not to be underestimated.

japanese: どっちもどっち/ひなたになるのは無理/もっと努力が必要
english: Both the same/ Becoming Hinata is impossible/ Need more effort

japanese: なぁ、夏！/バレー部って、/学園祭で何やるんだっけ？
english: Hey, Natsu! /What's volleyball club /doing for the festival?

japanese: どっちもどっちだ/ひなたになるのは無理/もっと努力が必要
english: Both the same/ Becoming Hinata is impossible/ Need more effort

japanese: なぁに、夏？/屋上でサボリぃ？
english: What, Natsu? /Slacking on the roof?

japanese: なっ！/おかしいだろ？/どっか間違ってるだろ？
english: What! /That's weird, right? /Something's wrong, right?

japanese: な、ナニも企んでないって！/私は、純粋に技をおぼえる為に……
english: I'm not plotting anything! /I'm purely learning techniques...

japanese: なぁ、ロベルト、/サッカー部は、/今年はどんな店を出してるんだ？
english: Hey, Roberto, /what shop is soccer club /running this year?

japanese: どれにしようか……
english: Which one should I choose...

japanese: どれにしよっか……
english: Which one should I choose...

japanese: なぁ、九郎……。/お前が何を企んで、/この学校に来たのかは知らない。
english: Hey, Kuro... /I don't know what you're planning /by coming to this school.

japanese: なぁに、夏。/また１人で黄昏てんの？
english: What, Natsu. /Daydreaming alone again?

japanese: な、なんの話だよ、まったく。/ボクは真剣に悩み相談をだな……。/おっと、もう時間だ。
english: W-what are you saying. /I'm seriously consulting... /Oops, it's time.

japanese: なぜなら、お前はあの技を/すでに使えるはずだからだ。
english: Because you should /already be able to use that move.

japanese: な、ナニも企んでないって！/俺は、純粋に技をおぼえる為にだな……
english: I'm not plotting anything! /I'm purely learning techniques...

japanese: な、なによ今の音は！？/ものすごくイヤ〜な予感がするのは/私だけ！？
english: W-what was that sound!? /Am I the only one /with a bad feeling!?

japanese: なぁ、俺に委員長のツープラトン技を/教えてくれないか？
english: Hey, teach me Chairperson's /Two-Platoon technique.

japanese: な、何を急にいい出すんだ。/そんな話は、関係ないだろ？
english: W-what are you suddenly saying. /That's not related, right?

japanese: どのデータではじめますか？
english: Which data to start with?

japanese: なぁ……、/まり、いいだろ？
english: Hey... /Mari, it's fine, right?

japanese: なぁ、アキラ、/ザキと一緒にいるときって、/何を話すんだ？
english: Hey, Akira, /when you're with Zaki, /what do you talk about?

japanese: なぁ、エッジ！/あっちにお化け屋敷があるんだってさ！/行ってみないか？
english: Hey, Edge! /There's a haunted house over there! /Wanna go?

japanese: なぁに、ももちゃん？/大きなゴミ袋なんかかかえて。/ゴミ捨て係？
english: What, Momo-chan? /Carrying a big trash bag. /Trash duty?

japanese: な……、それでいいだろ？
english: Well... that's fine, right?

japanese: な、なんだ、今の音は！？/ものすごくイヤ〜な予感がするのは/俺だけか！？
english: W-what was that sound!? /Am I the only one /with a bad feeling!?

japanese: な、何いい出すのよ……。/急に……。
english: W-what are you saying... /Suddenly...

japanese: な、何よ突然。
english: W-what, suddenly.

japanese: なぁ、!0！/一生懸命、何かを作るってのも、/結構イイもんだな！
english: Hey, !0! /Working hard to make something /is pretty good!

japanese: なぁ、アキラ、/女子校に行ってどうだ？/楽しいか？
english: Hey, Akira, /how's the girls' school? /Is it fun?

japanese: なぁに、ロベルト、/サッカーボールなんか持って。/こんなときまで、練習するつもりなの？
english: What, Roberto, /carrying a soccer ball. /Practicing even now?

japanese: どんな食べ物があるか、/考えただけでもヨダレが……っと。/……あれ、どうかしたの？
english: Just thinking about the food /makes me drool... /...Huh, what's wrong?

japanese: なぁ、!0は、/オイラみたいなチビと一緒に/歩きたくはないかな……？
english: Hey, !0, /don't you not want to walk /with a shorty like me...?

japanese: なぁ、ザキ！/アイス買ってきたんだ。/一緒に食べないか？
english: Hey, Zaki! /I bought ice cream. /Wanna eat together?

japanese: どっちかっていうと、/同じ立場で話ができる、夏みたいな/女の子の方が、好かれるんじゃないかなぁ。
english: If I had to choose, girls like Natsu /who I can talk to as equals /are more likable.

japanese: なぁ、夏のツープラトン技を/俺にも教えてくれよ。
english: Hey, teach me Natsu's /Two-Platoon technique too.

japanese: なぁ、岩！/相撲部の出し物って、何だっけ？
english: Hey, Iwa! /What's the sumo club's event?

japanese: なぁに、これ？/巻き物みたいだけど……。
english: What's this? /Looks like a scroll...

japanese: なぁに、ももちゃん？/その大きな荷物は。
english: What, Momo-chan? /That big bag.

japanese: なっ！　岩？/……ん？
english: What! Iwa? /...Huh?
